item.title: Getty 和 Shutterstock 携手应对不确定的人工智能未来
item.description: 价值数十亿美元的照片档案合并可能会撼动人工智能产业。但首先...【原文：A multibillion-dollar merger of photo archives may shake up the artificial intelligence industry. But first...】

item.title: 中国的出口繁荣表明其贸易正在发生转变而非放缓
item.description: 去年，中国出口的商品数量创下历史新高，贸易顺差增至近 1 万亿美元，凸显出尽管政府采取保护主义，企业也在努力实现供应商多样化，但全球贸易仍不平衡。【原文：China exported a record amount of goods last year, swelling its trade surplus to almost $1 trillion and underscoring how global commerce remains unbalanced despite government protectionism and efforts by companies to diversify their supplier bases.】

item.title: 中国出口激增可能引发特朗普的愤怒
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特，驻悉尼的国际经济企业编辑。今天我们关注中国对美国的贸易顺差。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册接收本新闻通讯，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics enterprise editor in Sydney. Today we’re looking at China’s trade surplus with the US. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 西班牙将限制非欧盟居民购买房地产
item.description: 西班牙政府将通过大幅提高外国人的纳税额来限制向外国人出售房屋的数量。【原文：Spain’s government will seek to limit the number of houses sold to foreigners by significantly raising the taxes they pay.】

item.title: Lululemon 因假日销售强劲而重获动力
item.description: Lululemon Athletica 公司预计第四季度销售额将超过市场预期，这表明该高档运动装品牌正在抵御后起竞争者和消费者支出增长放缓的冲击。【原文：Lululemon Athletica Inc. expects fourth quarter sales to surpass the market’s expectations, showing the upscale activewear brand is fending off upstart competitors and slower growth in consumer spending.】

item.title: 比特币在风险资产大跌中跌至 11 月以来最低点
item.description: 由于投资者在债券收益率急剧上升后抛售风险资产，比特币跌至近两个月低点。【原文：Bitcoin slumped to an almost two-month low as investors dumped riskier assets after a sharp rise in bond yields.】

item.title: 以色列去年为支付战争筹集了创纪录数额的债券
item.description: 以色列去年举债创下历史新高，以资助其对哈马斯和其他伊朗支持的民兵发动的多线战争。【原文：Israel raised a record amount of debt last year to fund its multi-front war against Hamas and other Iran-backed militias.】

item.title: 高盛称融资利差下降预示股票抛售活跃
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：This year’s sharp decline in funding spread suggests that institutional investors’ positioning in equities is shifting as markets rethink the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate path, according to strategists at Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 韩国养老金管理局开始出售美元以支持韩元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，韩国国家养老金管理局已开始进行战略性货币对冲，并正在向市场抛售美元，这可能导致购买高达约 500 亿美元的本币。【原文：South Korea’s National Pension Service’s has begun strategic currency hedging and is selling dollars into the market, according to people familiar with the matter, which could result in purchases of up to about $50 billion in local currency.】

item.title: 风险加剧，习惯 5%债券收益率的世界
item.description: 如果美国银行（Bank of America）的策略师没有看错的话，美国债券市场目前正处于自 1790 年以来第三次大熊市的第六个年头。【原文：If strategists at Bank of America are correct, the US bond market is now in the sixth year of the third great bear market since 1790.】

item.title: 特朗普斥资 130 亿美元在迪拜建人吸引了对美国大举进攻的怀疑论者
item.description: 即使在以支持雄心勃勃的项目而闻名的迪拜酋长国，当当地富豪侯赛因-萨贾瓦尼（Hussain Sajwani）站在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）身边，承诺向美国数据中心投资 200 亿美元时，许多人也大吃一惊。【原文：Even in the emirate of Dubai — renowned for embracing ambitious projects — many were taken aback when local tycoon Hussain Sajwani stood beside Donald Trump to pledge a $20 billion investment in US data centers.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚大胆推动绿色发展的意外代价：天然气进口
item.description:
安第斯国家必须引进碳足迹更大的货物，因为其自身的储量正在减少，而且其总统拒绝允许签订新的钻探合同。【原文：

The Andean nation must bring in cargoes with a bigger carbon footprint as its own reserves dwindle and its president refuses to allow new drilling contracts.

】

item.title: 为什么人工智能投资者应该担心自动驾驶汽车撞车？
item.description:
机器人出租车本应是自动化中最容易实现的部分。通用汽车的失败表明，该行业距离实现其狂野的承诺还有多远。【原文：

Robotaxis were supposed to be the easy part of automation. The failure of GM’s effort shows how far the industry is from living up to its wild promises.

】

item.title: OpenAI 在向新华盛顿推销时强调与中国的竞争
item.description:
这家初创公司的高层管理人员计划在华盛顿特区和至少两个关键的摇摆州举办聚会，以加强对人工智能投资的支持。【原文：

The startup’s top execs plan to host gatherings in DC and at least two key swing states to bolster support for AI investment.

】

item.title: 刹车故障召回后宝马销量下滑，中国需求下滑
item.description: 宝马汽车公司（BMW AG）去年的汽车销量下滑，原因是代价高昂的召回事件加剧了中国需求的下滑，这对德国汽车制造商造成了沉重打击。【原文：BMW AG car sales slipped last year as a costly recall compounded a slump in demand in China that’s hit Germany’s automakers hard.】

item.title: 股市上涨显现压力，华尔街寻找廉价避险工具
item.description: 2025 年伊始，投资者面临着一个难题：如何防范潜在的更大风险，同时又不错失股市反弹。【原文：Investors are starting 2025 with a conundrum: how to protect against potentially bigger risks while not missing out on a stock-market rally.】

item.title: 降息效应减弱，智利债券交易员准备承受更多损失
item.description: 智利的固定收入收益率达到了六个月来的最高点，短期内出现转折的希望渺茫。【原文：Chilean fixed-income yields are the highest in six months, and there is little hope for a U-turn any time soon.】

item.title: 白宫发布限制出口英伟达人工智能芯片的新规定
item.description: 白宫公布了对英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）及其同行销售先进人工智能芯片的全面新限制，让特朗普政府决定如何以及是否实施遭到业界激烈反对的限制措施。【原文：The White House unveiled sweeping new limits on the sale of advanced AI chips by Nvidia Corp. and its peers, leaving the Trump administration to decide how and whether to implement curbs that have encountered fierce industry opposition.】

item.title: 奥地利极右翼计划削减预算开支以避免欧盟处罚
item.description: 奥地利谈判代表试图组建一个民族主义保守派政府，他们的目标是立即削减 63 亿欧元（64 亿美元）的预算开支，以避免受到欧盟的指责。【原文：Austrian negotiators trying to form a nationalist-conservative government will target €6.3 billion ($6.4 billion) in immediate budget spending cuts to avoid being reprimanded by the European Union.】

item.title: 就业数据公布后，国债大跌波及全球市场
item.description: 本周伊始，由于交易员们在周五的美国就业报告公布后缩减了对美联储降息的押注，国债开始走弱。【原文：Treasuries started the week on the backfoot as traders scaled back bets on Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts following Friday’s blowout US employment report.】

item.title: KKR 旗下 Selecta 公司向债券持有人筹集 5000 万欧元现金
item.description: Selecta Group BV 已从部分债券持有人处筹集了 5000 万欧元（5100 万美元），以增强其资产负债表。【原文：Selecta Group BV has raised €50 million ($51 million) from some of its bondholders to boost its balance sheet.】

item.title: 香港公用事业公司中电聘请前 Natixis 银行家 Tse 领导并购业务
item.description: 香港最大的电力供应商中电控股有限公司（CLP Holdings Ltd.）已聘请 Natixis SA 前银行家 Jonathan Tse 领导其交易工作。【原文：CLP Holdings Ltd., Hong Kong’s top electricity provider, has hired former Natixis SA banker Jonathan Tse to lead its dealmaking efforts.】

item.title: 印度周五拒绝接受被美国制裁的油轮
item.description: 印度将拒绝美国制裁的油轮，因为这些油轮为俄罗斯运送货物，这是华盛顿的措施对全球石油市场造成影响的又一个例子。【原文：India is set to reject oil tankers sanctioned by the US for their role in moving cargoes for Russia, another example of impact that Washington’s measures are having on the global oil market.】

item.title: 苹果在英国审判中面临 "暴利 "指控
item.description: 在英国首次针对大型科技公司的集体诉讼审判中，苹果公司将就其利用 App Store 滥用市场支配地位赚取 "暴利 "的指控进行辩护。【原文：Apple Inc. will defend allegations that it made “exorbitant profits” by using its App Store to abuse its dominant market position at the first UK class action trial against a Big Tech firm.】

item.title: 印度通胀缓解，卢比暴跌削弱降息希望
item.description: 印度上个月的通胀有所缓解，但货币暴跌可能会让央行有理由推迟降息。【原文：India’s inflation eased last month, but a plunging currency may give the central bank reason to delay cutting interest rates just yet.】

item.title: 基础设施基金曼萨看好非洲投资机会
item.description: 总部设在非洲的基础设施开发和投资公司 Mansa Infrastructure Partners 正在寻求在 2025 年筹集 3 亿美元，用于非洲大陆的基础设施投资。【原文：Mansa Infrastructure Partners, an Africa-based infrastructure development and investment company, is seeking to raise $300 million in 2025 for infrastructure investments across the continent.】

item.title: 西欧各地的冰冻天气将推高供暖需求
item.description: 西欧各地的冰冻气温将推动本周的供暖需求上升，天气前景将比之前的预测更加寒冷。【原文：Freezing temperatures across western Europe will drive up heating demand this week, with the weather outlook turning colder than previous forecasts.】

item.title: 印度政府在抗议声中推进电力私有化
item.description: 印度人口最多的北方邦（Uttar Pradesh）正在推进其备受争议的计划，将部分电力公司私有化，以确保在需求不断增长的情况下可靠供电。【原文：India’s most populous state Uttar Pradesh is going ahead with its controversial plan to privatize some of its power utilities in an effort to ensure reliable supply amid rising demand.】

item.title: 银信即将与包括阿布扎比在内的投资者达成 10 亿美元融资协议
item.description: 据知情人士透露，马来西亚能源基础设施公司银信控股有限公司（Yinson Holdings Bhd.【原文：Malaysian energy infrastructure firm Yinson Holdings Bhd. is close to signing up investors for a funding round in its unit that makes equipment used by the offshore oil and gas industry, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的威尔逊认为美元走强将导致利润大幅缩水
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的策略师认为，美元反弹很可能会导致本季度美国企业的盈利记分卡出现重大分化，以国内为导向的行业将超越那些拥有大量国际收入的行业。【原文：A rallying dollar is likely to drive a big divide in Corporate America’s earnings scorecard this season, with domestically oriented sectors outshining those with large international revenues, according to Morgan Stanley strategists.】
